Hierarchy For All Packages

Package Hierarchies:
  • org.apache.log4j,
  • org.apache.log4j.config,
  • org.apache.log4j.helpers,
  • org.apache.log4j.spi,
  • org.apache.log4j.xml

Class Hierarchy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.log4j.BasicConfigurator
    • org.apache.log4j.Category
      • org.apache.log4j.Logger
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.builder.api.ConfigurationBuilderFactory
      • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.ConfigurationFactory
        • org.apache.log4j.config.Log4j1ConfigurationFactory
    • org.apache.log4j.xml.DOMConfigurator
    • org.apache.log4j.spi.Filter
    • org.apache.log4j.Layout
      • org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
    • org.apache.log4j.spi.LoggingEvent
    • org.apache.log4j.LogManager
    • org.apache.log4j.MDC
    • org.apache.log4j.NDC
    • org.apache.log4j.helpers.NullEnumeration (implements java.util.Enumeration<E>)
    • org.apache.log4j.Priority
      • org.apache.log4j.Level (implements java.io.Serializable)
    • org.apache.log4j.PropertyConfigurator
    • org.apache.log4j.config.PropertySetter
    • java.lang.Throwable (implements java.io.Serializable)
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.apache.log4j.config.PropertySetterException
